title: VO2 Vegan Cafe
description: Opened since July 2013, this vegan cafe is attached to the front of O2 Yoga Studio's Cambridge location. Specializes in a menu of cruelty-free casual fare which includes sandwiches, wraps, soups, pastries, coffee, tea, and smoothies. Also in the space is a retail store selling US-made products plus a wellness center offering massage, acupuncture, and chiropractic services. Take Red line to Harvard or Central T stop.
